page.title: 02PEOPLE OF FELTWELL
page.content: Since 1960 many new houses have been built. People moved to Feltwell from London, Hertfordshire and Essex (32% of all the people we asked) Also many Americans live on the base, some rent houses in the village. 26% came from the surrounding villages, 8% were born here. We found that people moved to Feltwell for several reasons. 28% moved here for a better house, 46% for their job but 25% moved to Feltwell to retire. (many from London and Essex) Some move here because it's cleaner and quieter. Most Americans stay here for three years but some leave the air force and stay on. Most people who come to Feltwell like it and stay for many years.
